channel.title: HElp please?
channel.description: When people post sources to download where do i use or download something to use as a client??:\

item.title: HElp please?
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

[quote=“Asuyuka, post:1, topic:535856”]My suggestion…

Give up.

If you don’t know this then you probably don’t know how to change the ip. If you don’t know how to change the ip then you don’t know how to portfoward. If you don’t know how to portfoward then you don’t know how to no-ip. If you don’t know how to no-ip then you don’t know how to server. If you don’t know how to server… all time is wasted.[/quote]

I can answer all this by three words, "He will learn"
I guess everyone started from scratch, same as you
My suggestion, Don’t give up,

I-T: As “Null Amount” said most downloading servers it contains the client and the source.

Read full topic

item.title: HElp please?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

It depends, what source are you using? Oftentimes server files are packaged with a client.
